intro.title: Jon Holmberg
intro.welcome: Hi, I'm a passionate Front-end Developer based in San Francisco, CA.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: With six years of experience, I have specialized in building captivating user interfaces using JavaScript, React, and TypeScript. My expertise lies in developing dynamic and responsive web applications that provide seamless user experiences. By leveraging React's component-based architecture, I create reusable and modular UI elements, enhancing development efficiency. The integration of TypeScript into my workflow helps catch errors early, improves code readability, and enables effective collaboration within development teams.

project1.title: Spice Delight App
project1.bio: A go-to app for exploring mouthwatering food items and recipes made to order. Whether you're a seasoned chef or a culinary enthusiast, our app will tantalize your taste buds and inspire your next cooking adventure!

footer.connected: Feel free to connect with any of my social network accounts
footer.name: Jon Holmberg
